task_requirements:
Implement fixes from specs/001-artk-core-v1/implementation-fixes.md:

**Total: 15 Issues**

**P0 - CRITICAL (Must Fix Before Release):**
1. P0-1: Fix Sample Config Schema Mismatch (core/typescript/__fixtures__/artk.config.yml) - 5 specific fixes: app.type, assertions, data.cleanup, browsers, journeys structure
2. P0-2: Unify TestDataManager Type Collision - Rename duplicate types in fixtures/index.ts and data/index.ts

**P1 - HIGH PRIORITY (Should Fix Soon):**
3. P1-1: Add OIDC + TOTP Integration Test (tests/integration/oidc-totp-flow.test.ts)
4. P1-2: Document Custom Auth Provider Implementation (docs/custom-auth-providers.md)

**P2 - MEDIUM PRIORITY:**
5. P2-1: Add Default PII Selectors to config/defaults.ts
6. P2-2: Validate Credentials at Config Load Time (auth/credentials.ts)
7. P2-3: Document Cleanup Order with Parallel Mode (docs/data-cleanup.md)
8. P2-4: Add Quickstart User Validation Evidence (SC-009) - documentation task

**P3 - MINOR (Low Priority):**
9. P3-1: Add Git SHA to Version File (version.json + build script)
10. P3-2: Centralize Timeout Defaults (config/timeouts.ts)
11. P3-3: Add Logger Format Option (utils/logger.ts)
12. P3-4: Document Test File Naming Convention (CONTRIBUTING.md)
13. P3-5: Add MFA Disclaimer to Form Auth (auth/providers/form.ts)
14. P3-6: Add Form Auth Provider Tests (auth/__tests__/form-provider.test.ts)
15. P3-7: Add Token Auth Provider Tests (auth/__tests__/token-provider.test.ts)

All files are in core/typescript/ directory. Run 'npm run test' and 'npm run typecheck' after each fix.
